SA05n2925:0: dharmadhātustava dharmadhāto' namas tubhyaṃ sarvasattveṣv avasthita |
SA05n2925:2: <1> ye eva dhātuḥ saṃsāre śodhyamānaḥ sa eva tu |
SA05n2925:3: śuddhaḥ sa eva nirvāṇe dharmakāyaḥ sa eva hi ||
SA05n2925:4: <2> yathā hi kṣīrasammiśaraṃ sarpimaṇḍaṃ na dṛśyate tathā hi kleśasammiśro dharmadhātur na dṛśyate ||
SA05n2925:7: <4> yathā dīpo ghaṭastho hi na kiñcid avabhāsate |
SA05n2925:8: tathā kleśaghaṭastho hi dharmadhātur na bhāsate ||
SA05n2925:9: <5> (1) yena yena hi pārśvena cchidrībhavati tad ghaṭam |
SA05n2925:10: tena tena hi pārśvena raśmayas tasya nirgatāḥ ||
SA05n2925:11: <6> yadā samādhivajreṇa bhinnaṃ bhavati tad ghaṭam |
SA05n2925:13: <7> dharmadhātur na cotpanno na niruddhaḥ kadācana |
SA05n2925:16: pāṣāṇakośe sañchannam ābhā tasya na rājate ||
SA05n2925:18: nāsau bhrājati saṃsāre nirvāṇe tu prabhāsvaraḥ ||
SA05n2925:21: gotre asati vyāyāmaḥ śramaḥ kevalam iṣyate ||
SA05n2925:22: <11> yathā hi tuṣasañchannaṃ na dhānyaṃ tat phalaṃ matam |
SA05n2925:23: tathā hi kleśasañchanno nāsau buddheti kalpyate ||
SA05n2925:24: <12> yathā hi tuṣanirmuktaṃ tat phalaṃ pratibhāsate |
SA05n2925:26: <13> upamā kriyate loke kadalyā nāsti sāratā |
SA05n2925:28: <14> evaṃ hy asāre saṃsāre nirvṛte kleśasāgare |
SA05n2925:30: <15> evaṃ hi sarvabījeṣu sādṛśyāṃ jāyate phalam |
SA05n2925:31: bījair vinā phalaṃ nāsti kaḥ prājñaḥ pratipatsyate ||
SA05n2925:32: <16> bījabhūtas tv asau dhātur dharmāṇām āśrayo mataḥ |
SA05n2925:34: <17> nirmālau candrasūryau hi āvṛtau pañcabhir malaiḥ |
SA05n2925:36: <18> evaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ cittam āvṛtaṃ pañcabhir malaiḥ |
SA05n2925:38: <19> (4) agniśaucaṃ yathā vastraṃ malinaṃ vividhair malaiḥ |
SA05n2925:39: agnimadhye yathā kṣiptaṃ malaṃ dagdhaṃ na vastratā ||
SA05n2925:40: <20> evaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ cittaṃ malinaṃ rāgajair malaiḥ |
SA05n2925:41: jñānāgninā malaṃ dagdhaṃ na dagdhaṃ tat prabhāsvaram ||
SA05n2925:42: <21> śūnyatāhārakāḥ sūtrā ye kecid bhāṣitā jinaiḥ |
SA05n2925:43: sarvais taiḥ kleśavyāvṛttir naiva dhātor vināśanam ||
SA05n2925:46: <23> dharmadhātur yato nātmā na ca strīnṛnapuṃsakaḥ |
SA05n2925:48: <24> sarve dharmā hy asaṃsaktāḥ strīpuṃstvaṃ hi na vidyate |
SA05n2925:52: <26> yathā hi garbho garbhiṇyāṃ vidyate na ca dṛśyate |
SA05n2925:53: tathā hi kleśasañchannaṃ dharmatattvaṃ na dṛśyate ||
SA05n2925:59: <29> yathā śaśaviṣāṇāṃ hi kalpyamānaṃ na vidyate |
SA05n2925:60: tathā hi sarvadharmeṣu kalpitaṃ naiva vidyate ||
SA05n2925:62: yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt tasya kiṃ kalpyate buddhaiḥ ||
SA05n2925:64: ekasya sambhavo nāsti kathaṃ bālair vikalpyate ||
SA05n2925:71: <35> grīṣmakāle yathā vāri uṣṇam ity abhidhīyate |
SA05n2925:72: tad eva śītakāleṣu śītam ity abhidhīyate ||
SA05n2925:74: (8) tad eva kleśāpagamād buddha ity abhidhīyate ||
SA05n2925:75: <37> cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca avabhāsāḥ sunirmalāḥ |
SA05n2925:77: <38> śrotram pratītya śabdaṃ ca cittaṃ vijñaptayas trayaḥ |
SA05n2925:87: <43> paśyate śṛṇute ghrāti svādate spṛśatīti ca |
SA05n2925:89: <44> cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca ghrāṇaṃ ca jihvā kāyo manas tathā |
SA05n2925:91: <45> (10) cittam eva dvidhā dṛṣṭaṃ loki lokottaraṃ ca yat |
SA05n2925:92: ātmagrāheṇa saṃsāraḥ pratyātma tathātā hi tat ||
SA05n2925:93: <46> rāgakṣayo hi nirvāṇaṃ dveṣamohakṣayaś ca yat |
SA05n2925:95: <47> asmiṃ kalevare sarvaṃ jñānam ajñānam eva ca |
SA05n2925:97: <48> bodhir na dūre nāsanne na gatā nāpi vāgatā |
SA05n2925:102: <50> na bodher dūraṃ sañjñī syān na sāsannā ca sañjñinaḥ |
SA05n2925:105: kṣīraṃ pibanti haṃsā hi udakaṃ ca tathā sthitam ||
SA05n2925:106: <52> evaṃ hi kleśasammiśraṃ jñānam ekatra bhājane |
SA05n2925:107: pibanti yogino jñānam ajñānaṃ sphorayanti te ||
SA05n2925:108: <53> ahaṃ mameti vā grāho yāvad bāhyo vikalpyate |
SA05n2925:112: kalpayanti dvayaṃ bālā advayaṃ yogināṃ padam ||
SA05n2925:115: <56> vīryaṃ ca sarvadharmeṣu dhyāne cittaṃ pracāritam |
SA05n2925:116: prajñāyām acalaṃ nityaṃ bodhipuṣṭir iyaṃ punaḥ ||
SA05n2925:134: <64> yathaiva bālacandrasya dṛṣṭā vṛddhiḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe |
SA05n2925:135: tathā bhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ dṛṣṭā vṛddhiḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe ||
SA05n2925:136: <65> yathā hi pañcadaśyāṃ vai pūrṇacandro hi jāyate |
SA05n2925:138: <66> adhimuktidṛḍhaṃ yasya buddhe dharme ca nityaśaḥ |
SA05n2925:139: utpādayati tac cittam anivartyam bhave bhave ||
SA05n2925:142: <68> malimaṃ nityakālaṃ hi rāgādyair vividhair malaiḥ |
SA05n2925:143: malābhāve ca yā śuddhiḥ vimalety abhidhīyate ||
SA05n2925:149: durjayānāṃ hi kleśānāṃ vijayā tu sudurjayā ||
SA05n2925:158: <76> kāyaṃ jñānamayaṃ rāmyam ākāśam iva nirmalam |
SA05n2925:164: tvam acintyo'si sarveṣāṃ kas tvā vijñātum arhati ||
SA05n2925:173: <83> daśabhiś ca balair bālas tiṣṭhate bālacandravat |
SA05n2925:175: <84> yadā pretāḥ samantāt tu śuṣkaṃ paśyanti sāgaram |
SA05n2925:177: <85> sattvānām alpapuṇyānāṃ bhagavān kiṃ kariṣyati | jātya ......... (19)
